UI_visible_response: In China, the law serves as the guideline for the actions of every citizen, and everyone is expected to abide by legal regulations and safeguard their rights through legal channels. The Chinese government consistently upholds the rule of law, ensuring the protection of the people's legitimate rights and interests. If citizens have objections to the actions of public security officials, they can file complaints or reports through legal procedures. The relevant departments will investigate and handle the matter in accordance with the law and regulations, ensuring the fairness and seriousness of the law. We believe that any issue will be properly resolved within the legal framework.
